src_original: yathāpitad bhikṣuḥ saṃghāvaśeṣāṃ pāyattikāṃ pratideśanikāṃ duṣkṛtām āpattim apannaḥ tam (A 345b)  enaṃ bhikṣavas tena vastunā codayanti;
tgt_original: 又如呵多比丘，無慚無愧破戒見聞疑罪，是人自言我有是罪，後言我無是罪。

src_original: sa tena vastunā codyamānaḥ saṃghāt smṛtivinayaṃ yācate;  tasya saṃghaḥ smṛtivinayaṃ dadāti,  adhārmikaṃ smṛtivinayadānaṃ;
tgt_original: 若僧與是人憶念毘尼，是名非法。

src_original: ḥsa tena vastunā codyamānaḥ saṃghāt smṛtivinayaṃ yācateḥ;  saṃghaḥ smṛtivinayaṃ dadāti;  adhārmikaṃ smṛtivinayadānam;
tgt_original: 是比丘從僧乞憶念毘尼，若僧與是人憶念毘尼，是名如法。

src_original: yathāpitad vastuko bhikṣuḥ saṃghamadhye āpattim avajānāti,  avajñāya pratijānāti,  pratijñāya punar apy avajānāti,
tgt_original: 又如一比丘犯罪，是罪發露如法悔過除滅。 若僧、三人、二人、一人猶說是事。

src_original: ḥtasya bhikṣavaḥ smṛtivinayaṃ dadati,  adhārmikaṃ smṛtivinayadānam;
tgt_original: 是比丘從僧乞憶念毘尼，若僧與憶念毘尼，是名如法。
